column1: #Text=[0206] A solution of Example 42H (1.6 g, 5.0 mmol) in a mixture of THF (20 mL) and water (10 mL) was treated with LiOH.H.sub.2O (530 mg, 12.2 mmol) in water (5 mL).
#Text=Methanol was added until a transparent solution formed (5 mL).
#Text=C. for overnight and the organic solvents were removed under vacuum.
#Text=The residual aqueous solution was acidified with 2 N HCl to pH 2 and was partitioned between ethyl acetate and water.
#Text=The organic phase was washed with water, dried (MgSO.sub.4), filtered and concentrated to give Example 421 (0.9 g, 62% yield).
